name: kusto-server
description: Express based custom server for simple backend service

scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ignore src/core/lib/types/generated-db-types.ts --exec "npm run generate-db-types && ts-node ./src/index.ts"
scripts.dev:serve: nodemon --watch src --ignore src/core/tmp/ --ignore src/core/lib/types/generated-db-types.ts --ext ts,js,json --exec "npm run generate-db-types && npm run build:dev && npm run serve"
scripts.build: npm run generate-db-types && npm run generate-routes-map && npm run build:routes && webpack --mode production && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.build:dev: npm run generate-db-types && npm run generate-routes-map && npm run build:routes && webpack --mode development && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.clean:tmp: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const tmpDir = path.join(__dirname, 'src', 'core', 'tmp'); if (fs.existsSync(tmpDir)) { fs.rmSync(tmpDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('ðŸ§¹ Cleaned tmp directory'); }"
